    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112653</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Word Order</string>
            <string language="en">Word Order</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordre des mots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ordem De Palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ordine delle parole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρά των λέξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orden de las palabras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Make the sentences correct by putting the words in their right place. The sentences are about Dublin in Ireland so you will learn some facts about the Irish capital at the same time.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Make the sentences correct by putting the words in their right place. The sentences åre about Dublin in Ireland so you will learn some facts about the Irish capital at the same time. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">word order</string>
            <string language="sv">Ireland</string>
            <string language="sv">Dublin</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">word order</string>
            <string language="en">Ireland</string>
            <string language="en">Dublin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Sie die Programmsätze korrekt, indem Sie 
die Wörter in ihren rechten Platz einsetzen. Die Programmsätze
åre über Dublin in Irland also in Ihnen erlernen einige Tatsachen 
über das irische Kapital gleichzeitig. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rendez les phrases correctes en mettant les mots 
dans leur bon endroit. Les phrases åre au sujet de Dublin en 
Irlande ainsi vous apprendront quelques faits sur le capital irlandais
en même temps. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour les 
débutants - module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça as sentenças corretas pondo as palavras em
seu lugar direito. As sentenças åre sobre Dublin em Ireland 
assim que em você aprenderão alguns fatos sobre o capital irish ao 
mesmo tempo. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para os 
novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Renda le frasi corrette mettendo le parole nel 
loro giusto posto. Le frasi åre circa Dublino in Irlanda in 
modo da voi impareranno alcuni fatti circa il capitale irlandese allo 
stesso tempo. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti -
modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταστήστε τις προτάσεις σωστές με την τοποθέτηση των 
λέξεων στη σωστή θέση τους. Οι προτάσεις εre για το 
Δουβλίνο στην Ιρλανδία έτσι εσείς θα μάθουν μερικά γεγονότα για
το ιρλανδικό κεφάλαιο συγχρόνως. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι
εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Haga las sentencias correctas poniendo las 
palabras en su lugar derecho. Las sentencias åre sobre Dublín 
en Irlanda así que usted aprenderán algunos hechos sobre el capital 
irlandés en el mismo tiempo. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral 
para los principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
